job.title: Software Engineer I
job.description: <br><p>Accendero&nbsp;Software, Inc. is seeking a candidate to fill the role of Software Engineer I at their Idaho Falls, ID location.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Accendero&nbsp;Software, Inc. works with&nbsp;state of the art&nbsp;start-ups and companies to help build the next generation of scientific and operational software infrastructure.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>The ideal candidate is a passionate developer who has experience with all levels of the software development lifecycle.&nbsp;This candidate should be prepared to immediately contribute in an agile engineering development and show leadership within a team of Junior Software Engineers.&nbsp;The ideal candidate should be prepared to adapt to changing requirements and deadlines&nbsp;in order to&nbsp;best suit customer needs.</p><p><br></p><p>Accendero&nbsp;Software, Inc.&nbsp;&nbsp;is an Equal&nbsp;Opportunity&nbsp;Employer and&nbsp;provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability or genetics.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>Responsibilities:&nbsp;</p><ul><li>Develop new software applications for clients in multiple languages depending on client needs.&nbsp;</li><li>Integrate with currently existing software applications to expand functionality depending on client needs.&nbsp;</li><li>Coordinate with Project Management and senior Engineering to ensure all code is tested and prepared in a timely manner.&nbsp;</li><li>Coordinate with Project Management and Quality to meet regulatory requirements for projects requiring&nbsp;GxP&nbsp;validation.&nbsp;</li><li>Respond to changing scope and deadlines smoothly and efficiently.&nbsp;</li><li>Take leadership roles on projects as required by Project Management.</li></ul><p><br></p><p>Requirements:&nbsp;</p><ul><li>A 4-year&nbsp;college degree&nbsp;(BS) in Computer Science or equivalent&nbsp;from a major accredited university and 1-2 years of full-stack software development experience&nbsp;OR&nbsp;3-5 years of related experience in software engineering&nbsp;</li><li>Experience with the Software Development Lifecycle and associated best practices.&nbsp;</li><li>Proven work experience with&nbsp;Python,&nbsp;Java, and Javascript.</li><li>Proven work experience with relational database structures.&nbsp;</li><li>Proven work experience with non-relational database structures, especially MongoDB.</li><li>Proven work experience with various version control software systems (Bitbucket, Git, etc.)</li><li>Proven work experience with RESTful APIs.</li><li>Demonstrable knowledge of best practices for testing code and proven work experience with various third party test suites (Selenium, Jest, etc.)</li><li>Excellent&nbsp;problem-solving&nbsp;skills and attention to detail.&nbsp;</li><li>Excellent oral and written communication skills&nbsp;</li></ul><p><br></p><p>Pluses:&nbsp;</p><ul><li>Experience with AWS.&nbsp;</li><li>Experience within a development environment interacting with regulatory schemas such as&nbsp;GxP&nbsp;or ISO.&nbsp;&nbsp;</li><li>Familiarity with various other web or statistical languages (R, PERL, Java, etc.).&nbsp;</li><li>Familiarity with Test Driven Development (TDD).&nbsp;</li></ul>
